mapper.insert: insert into payment( seq,vendcode,yyyy,mm,dd,no, hang,amount,payway,memo )values( (select ifnull(MAX(seq)+1,1) from payment alias_payment), #{vendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{hang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{payway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select seq,vendcode,yyyy,mm,dd,no,hang, B.name vendname, procode,C.name proname,sum(qty) qty, sum(price * qty) total,memo from payment A, vender B, product C where vendcode=#{vendcode} and yyyy=#{yyyy} and mm=#{mm} and A.vendcode=B.code and A.procode=C.code group by mm,dd,no,hang WITH ROLLUP
